title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Silverstone Motor Circuit - version 0.5
description:
In this video we will look at the Silverstone Motorsport Circuit addon which has been updated to version 0.5. Compared to the earlier version it received another facelift which increases the quality again. Several new custom models have been added which will add several info signs both Silverstone related but also things like the heliport, traffic lights etc..
The heliport is also a new addition which is really cool so now you can even take off from Silverstone using one of the old runways.

If you also want to give the scenery updates a try download your own copy using the link below:

https://flightsim.to/file/17999/wip-silverstone-motorsport-circuit-uk
